document.full_text: lawyers and advocates say a trustee program aimed at protecting veterans and their families from financial loss and abuse is mismanaged, poorly regulated and does more harm than good.
document.title: instead of helping, trustee program is hurting veterans, families say
lines_and_colors: lawyers and advocates say a trustee program aimed at protecting veterans and their families from financial loss and abuse is mismanaged, poorly regulated and does more harm than good.
